meta_description: Magic is a Group of companies located in Qatar that offers services such as, cleaning and hospitality and real estate services for agents and clients, this group of companies include,magic special one and magic real estate
hero: A Qatari group of companies that started in 2022, with a goal to change the Qatari market by providing premier services and meet the Qatari market needs.
about_us_description: Magic group operates in different sectors, with a mission to change the Qatari market with its unparalleled services.
companie_1: We offer assistance to people whether they have an apartment or are in the market for one, by offering all necessary real estate management services.
companie_2: Providing world-class quality for individuals and companies in the Cleaning and Hospitality Service market.
